sliders.title:
Welcome to your
Weight Loss ProgramNAME_PLACEHOLDER
sliders.detail: We are so excited to be part of your health journey. We’d like to get to know you so that we can build a successful program that’s tailored to your lifestyle!

sliders.title: Australia's only Weight Loss Program incorporating nutrition, exercise and psychology
sliders.detail: Our chef-prepared menu is made fresh and delivered to your door, while our team of experts are there to support you along the way.

sliders.title:
Get ready!

check.title:
Before we start,
we just need a couple of quick details
check.message:
Sorry! Unfortunately we don’t deliver this program to your location just yet.

You can order a regular meal plan through the MYMC app, or check our Store Locator for your closest MYMC stockist.

preset.title: Tell us a bit about yourself
preset.description: We collect this info to create accurate calorie targets for your meal plan

options.name: Yes
options.tip:
Weight loss is not recommended during pregnancy unless it is under the strict supervision of a healthcare professional.

Instead, we encourage you to choose from our entire menu of 90+ deliciously healthy options.

options.name: No
Yes
options.tip: As a breastfeeding mum, we understand life can get busy! We have put together a nutritionally balanced meal plan for you. We recommend consulting your health care professional for any specific health and nutrition advice.

options.name: No

loadingScreen.title: Creating your exercise routine...
loadingScreen.subtitle: Did you know?
loadingScreen.description: Exercise increases your metabolic rate, which helps burn more calories & improves mental health

options.name: I’m relatively inactive or don’t exercise

loadingScreen.title: That’s okay, we’ll create a plan to ensure you reach your goals
loadingScreen.subtitle: We recommend
loadingScreen.description: Going for a daily walk for fresh air

preset.title: We’ve put together a routine to get you started
preset.description: Your activity levels will help determine your food intake. Don’t worry - you can swap around your days later.

loadingScreen.title: Analysing your nutritional needs...
loadingScreen.description: Based on our research of similar people, we are building the best menu for you.

loadingScreen.title: Analysing your nutritional needs...
loadingScreen.description: Based on our research of similar people, we are building the best menu for you.

preset.title: Here’s our recommendation for breastfeeding women
preset.description: Activity levels determine your daily food intake. While you are breastfeeding, your calorie needs tend to be higher so we have preselected ‘Very Active’ days for you.

loadingScreen.title: Analysing your nutritional needs...
loadingScreen.description: Based on our research of similar people, we are building the best menu for you.

activeLevelTips.name: Lightly Active Day
activeLevelTips.detail: Light amount of incidental activity (<7k steps/day). This is a planned recovery day or if you are injured.

activeLevelTips.name: Active Day
activeLevelTips.detail: Moderate amount of incidental activity (7-12k steps day) + completing 45-60mins of exercise.

activeLevelTips.name: Very Active Day
activeLevelTips.detail: Significant amount of incidental activity (>12k steps/day) + completing 60-75mins of exercise.

female.title: Would you like to achieve more out of your program?
female.subtitle: Our pilot study on the Complete Plan found that:

details.name: 54% achieved their goals within the first 3 weeks
On average, people lost at least 3.9% of body weight
9/10 would recommend this plan to friends & family

mealTips.title: Keep it fresh!
mealTips.detail: We want you to enjoy our fresh salads at their best, so we’ve made sure you can only add them to the first 4 days of your weekly meal plan.

wlp-full.title: Breakfast
wlp-full.detail: A high protein start to the day to give you the energy to power through the morning.

wlp-full.title: Light Snack
wlp-full.detail: A light, nutrient-dense snack is a great way to keep up energy levels and reduce the temptation to snack on empty calories.

wlp-full.title: Recharge Snack
wlp-full.detail: A high protein snack consumed between meals closer to the time of your exercise session will aid in recovery.

wlp-full.title: PM Treat
wlp-full.detail: A healthy diet does not mean missing out. Treat yourself to a healthy dessert after dinner without the guilt.
